content: :ping_pong: @Yakov Pechersky, this PR #17522 is currently assigned to you, and has been waiting since November. Do you have time to do a final review and suggest what happens next? If not, please either unassign yourself, says so here, or suggest someone else to take over! :-) Thanks.
Yes, I'll look over it and leave comments this week.

Review added

Mostly renames, golfs, and style nits, with two lemmas to be added so that erw can be avoided. Approved in general.
